com.communote.server.api.util

Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.util.JsonHelper

  • public class JsonHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for working with JSON.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.codehaus.jackson.map.ObjectMapper getSharedObjectMapper()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getSharedObjectMapper

        public static org.codehaus.jackson.map.ObjectMapper getSharedObjectMapper()
        Returns a pre-configured ObjectMapper which (and especially its JSON and node factories) can be reused. Because the mapper is shared, it must not be configured by the caller.
        Returns:
        the shared, pre-configured ObjectMapper.

      • readJsonTree

        public static org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode readJsonTree(String jsonString)
        Deserialize a JSON string into a JSON tree. If the string cannot be converted null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - the string to parse
        Returns:
        the JSON tree or null

      • writeJsonTree

        public static void writeJsonTree(Writer writer,
                                 org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode rootNode)
                          throws IOException
        Serialize a JSON tree.
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer to write to
        rootNode - the root node of the JSON object structure
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an exception while serializing the json object

      • writeJsonTreeAsString

        public static String writeJsonTreeAsString(org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode rootNode)
        Converts a JSON tree into a string and ignores exceptions. In case of an exception the result will be the empty string.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - the root node of the tree, can be null to produce a null node
        Returns:
        the serialized JSON object
